definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Down by the salley gardens ma love and I did meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的爱人曾和我相会在柳园中。
希望有缘人在这里相会。

sentences.english: Only once a year, the couple could meet on the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎与织女一年才能在鹊桥上相会一次。

sentences.english: Meet XiaoWei wen-hao Chen and dream.
We were hurled together again in Paris after the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争结束之后我们又一次在巴黎相会了。

sentences.english: I know that I shall meet my fate somewhere among the clouds above.
sentences.chinese: 我将在云之上，与命运之神相会。

sentences.english: However, it is still a day to celebrate the annual meeting of the loving couple, the Cowherd and the Girl Weaver.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它仍是牛郎织女一年一度的鹊桥相会日。

sentences.english: Has the reason grear distance to meet . is this your my fate?
sentences.chinese: 有缘千里来相会，难道这就是你我的缘份吗？

sentences.english: The sixth,the one you should not opposite,so then you may not meet.
sentences.chinese: 第六最好不相对，如此便可不相会。

sentences.english: Travel dream, Lelax yourself , Meeting in boke .
sentences.chinese: 为梦想，解烦恼，相会在博客。

sentences.english: They are generated in the bridge, meet some wonderful story.
sentences.chinese: 他们就是在断桥相会而产生了一段美好的故事的。

sentences.english: It is never glad about injustice but rejoices whenever the truth wins out.
sentences.chinese: 这是从来没有不公平只喜好高兴每认真相会得胜。

sentences.english: Now. just wake up. You've got work to do.
sentences.chinese: 你可以不用在梦中和我相会了，我已经来到你身边。

sentences.english: Then we shall not meet in Paris?
sentences.chinese: 那么我们不能在巴黎相会了？

sentences.english: Sir Lancelot Khan gonna meet you on the air tonight in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 蓝斯络爵士与您相会在空中。

definition: to see each other/to meet in person
to meet (in person)/to meet with sb
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to know each other/to recognize/to identify/to acknowledge (an old relationship)
to keep a promise/to honor an agreement
